results.title: Learning
results.brief_description: Summary: Shows experiments in learning. B.F. Skinner, Richard Malott deal with operant conditioning. Nathan Azrin demonstrates aversive conditioning. Jack Hailman deals with sign stimuli. G.P. Baerends demonstrates super normal conditioning and explains t

results.title: Woman of Chamula : Indian family
results.brief_description: SUMMARY: Shows the life of a Mexican Indian family in Chiapas where the Indians live in much the same way as their Mayan ancestors a thousand years ago. Describes the mother of the family and her activities in the home

results.title: Which energy
